channel.title: Whats wrong with this...?

item.title: Whats wrong with this...?
item.dc:creator: @Neon_Wrecks Neon Wrecks
item.description:
@Neon_Wrecks wrote:

When I put this in my client.java under the CORRECT void its spews a shitload of errors. What is wrong with this code?

} else if (useItemID == 2893 && (atObjectID == 2783 || atObjectID == 11666 && playerLevel[10] <= 90)) {
				addItem(15195, 1);
				sendMessage("You forge a Dragon Full Helmet.");
				addSkillXP((1000000 * playerLevel[14]), 14);
				deleteItem(2893, getItemSlot(2893), 1);
				} else (
				sendMessage("You do not have the requirements to make a Dragon Full Helmet.");
				break;

Basically the code is so that way when you use an Elemental Metal on an Anvil it will give you a Dragon Full Helmet and destroy your Elemental Metal, and in the process gives you 500,000 EXP to Smithing.

Requirements:
90 Smithing
Elemental Metal
A Hammer (Not seen in the code because I didnâ€™t put it in at the time.)

Whats wrong with the code?

Read full topic
